text.body:
itu pirivuṇarttiya talaivaṟkut talaivi emmaiyum uṭaṉkoṇṭu ceṉmiṉeṉṟāṭku avaṉ kāṉiṉkaṭumaiyun talaivimeṉmaiyuṅ kūṟuvatu kēṭṭa talaivi nāḷatu ciṉmaiyum iḷamaiyatarumaiyuṅ kūṟi emmaiyum uṭaṉkoṇṭu ceṉmiṉeṉṟatu.
palvaḷam pakarpūṭṭum payaṉilam paitaṟac
celkatir ñāyiṟu ceyirciṉañ coritaliṟ
ṟaṇivilveṅ kōṭaikkut taṇṇayan taṇikoḷḷum
piṇiteṟa luyakkatta peruṅkaḷiṟ ṟiṉantāṅku
maṇitikaḻ viṟaṉmalai vempa maṇpakat
tuṇikayan tukaḷpaṭṭa tūṅkaḻal veñcuram;
kiḷipurai kiḷaviyāy niṉṉaṭik keḷiyavō
taḷiyuṟu paṟiyāvē kāṭeṉak kūṟuvīr
vaḷiyiṉum varainillā vāḻunā ṇummākat
taḷiyeṉa vuṭaiyēṉyā ṉavalaṅkoṇ ṭaḻivalō;
ūṟunī ramiḻtēykku meyiṟṟāynī yuṇalvēṭpi
ṉāṟunī rilaveṉa vaṟaṉōkkik kūṟuvīr
yāṟunīr kaḻintaṉṉa viḷamainun neñceṉṉun
tēṟunī ruṭaiyēṉyāṉ ṟerumantīṅ koḻivalō;
māṇeḻil vēyveṉṟa tōḷāynī variṟṟāṅku
māṇiḻa lilavāṇṭai marameṉak kūṟuvīr
nīṇiḻaṟ ṟaḷirpōla niṟaṉūḻtta laṟivēṉun
tāṇiḻalkai viṭṭiyāṉ ṟavirtalaic cūḻvalō;
eṉavāṅku,
aṇaiyarum vemmaiya kāṭeṉak kūṟuvīr
kaṇaikaḻi kallāta kalpiṟaṅ kāriṭaip
paṇaiyerut teḻilēṟṟiṉ piṉṉarp
piṇaiyuṅ kāṇirō piriyumō vavaiyē.
